WorkPlace.Name: SKATEPRO ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
SkatePro er en af Danmarks førende e-handelsvirksomheder - vinder af 5 e-handelspriser, kundeservice på 17 sprog, salg i 20+ lande, og en vækst fra 1 => 200+ ansatte på kun fjorten år.

Vi er et ungt og dynamisk team med medarbejdere fra det meste af Europa. Fælles for os alle er, at vi brænder for actionsport, e-commerce og at give kunden den gode oplevelse og den bedste support.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: IT DEVELOPER FOR LEADING EUROPEAN ACTION SPORT WEBSHOP
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
At SkatePro we are now looking for a new IT developer with 3-5 years of experience. Are you ready to be part of a great IT team? Have you built some experience, and still eager to learn? Are you already located in Denmark or interested to move to Denmark?  

 

THE POSITION

We are a young and dynamic team, and due to busyness we are looking for a new colleague to our IT team. The team is developing and maintaining all our IT solutions. We are making an effort doing a good job to make the work environment nice for ourselves, our colleagues and not least for our customers.

We are an international company and have colleagues from different countries. The work environment is informal and very dynamic. The job is a full-time position, and you will be part of a great IT team with 6 front-end and 2 back-end developers and 2 trainees. You will be reporting to our head of IT.

Your tasks and responsibilities will primarily be:

  • Development and maintenance of existing systems and solutions
  • Implementation and integration of new systems and features
  • Work process optimization using IT solutions
  • BI development for dashboards and reporting

 

PERSONAL AND PROFESSIONAL COMPETENCIES

  • You have a positive attitude
  • You have to be a good team player 
  • You are self-driven and proactive
  • You speak and write English
  • You have experience with MS SQL Server
  • You have experience with .Net Core and Framework
  • You come with 3-5 years of experience
  • An advantage if you have been working with or developed in Microsoft C5

 

WE OFFER

  • Flexible working conditions 
  • An international work environment
  • Salary based on qualifications
  • Relocation support including accommodation
  • Pension scheme and health insurance

In addition, we love to have fun with each other both while we are at work and outside working hours. We host a lot of social events during the year, which are sponsored by SkatePro.

 

ABOUT SKATEPRO

SkatePro is a Danish action sports e-commerce company based just outside of Aarhus, Denmark, and we sell all kinds of equipment for skate, ski, BMX, surf and much more. Our mission is to ensure everybody who wants to explore the passion within action sport has the means to do so. We give honest advice, so our customer gets exactly what they need instead of, what we think sells best. The customer having a good time with our products is our main focus. At our office and warehouse in Søften north of Aarhus, our more than 200 employees work together every day to send action sports products to more than 30 countries.

 

PRACTICAL INFORMATION

  • Working hours: 37 hours per week
  • Starting date: As soon as possible
  • Application deadline: We invite for interviews on an ongoing basis
  • Workplace: Omega 6, Søften, 8382 Hinnerup

If you find the position interesting, please send a short application and your CV (preferably in PDF format) to job@skatepro.com, and write "IT Developer" in the subject field. Please enter your email address in your CV, so we can get in touch with you quickly.
